reviews.text:
Very nice place to stay in Ljubljana. Room was clean and nice, air conditioner worked perfectly. Staff was super friendly, breakfast was fresh with all the basic options. Restaurant was good place to eat dinner also.
Even it's not in centrum, buss goes like every 10 minutes so it's easy to move around the city.
I highly recommend! And definitely I will stay here again next time I visit Ljubljana ðŸ˜Š

Spent two nights there, everything was just perfect. Room super clean, has everything you need, even the kettle. Breakfast delicious, staff super friendly. The only thing that you should have in mind is that there is no elevator, if that is a problem to you.

Easily accessible location close to center town and simple check-in, peaceful environment, super friendly owner, free parking, fast free wifi, clean and cosy rooms and varied breakfast buffet. Higly recommended!
The place is very good. Location near the district. Staff is a very polite. Rooms are very clean. All recommended.

Been there twice, will go again everytime I'll pass through Ljubljana. Nice clean rooms, nice location with a pub/restaurant at the ground floor, the host was very friendly and helpfull, speaks English. Parking is not a problem regardless of the hour of arrival, a few minutes away from the interstate. For me it was the perfect location. Oh, and has a really nice breakfast with lots to choose from, you won't leave hungry.
